content_block_static.name: Leaking Service Portal Widget Remediation
content_block_static.static_content:
Please take a good look at the widget(s) and answer the following questions:

  • Is there a good reason for the Widget to be public?
  • Does the Widget accept dynamic input, e.g. via $sp.getParameter?
  • Does the Widget expose data to the caller?
  • Does the Widget loop over a records of a table and expose data to the caller?
  • Does the Widget access a table dynamically (e.g. input-dependent)?

If you answer several of those questions with 'yes' or 'maybe', then you have a good chance that the widget might leak data to an attacker and you should set the Widget to 'Public = false'.
